reviews.text: The station looks very impressive after its recent refurb.Staff are always available to help and the new lifts have made a big difference to those with prams and the elderly.

I don't understand why so many people are saying bad things about this place, yes, it's small, but what can we do about that? I personally have nothing bad to say about this station as every journey I had using this station has been very good, the station staff are helpful.
Great refurbishment, clean and now with lifts.

Every day something is wrong. They close the station every other day, the oyster card machine doesn't work and the ticket office is staffed by people who either don't care or have an issue with the public, with sarcastic and condescending remarks, and leaving the office to take a break leaving it with no staff, and customers waiting to top up their travel tickets. That's before you have even tried to get on a train. The trains are over packed and the Maryland staff do not try to help people bord. For those unwilling to fight to bord the train, realistically you are not going to get anywhere before 8:50.
Apart from station staff, the morning service is unreliable and a step back for this modern age, hope they act together, we paying customers, im not one to complain but i have to
